mapper.insert: insert into lecture (lname, day, startTime, endTime, personnel, room, target, tno) values (#{lname}, #{day}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{personnel}, #{room}, #{target}, #{tno})
mapper.update: update lecture set lname=#{lname}, teacher=#{teacher}, day=#{day}, startTime=#{startTime}, endTime=#{endTime}, personnel=#{personnel}, room=#{room}, target=#{target} where lno = #{lno}
mapper.select: select * from lecture order by lno desc
